rules.natural: Provided that the team publishes a study, the research is valid.
If a journal accepts a paper, then whenever a panel peer-reviews that paper, the research is valid.
Under the condition that a conference accepts a paper, then if a panel peer-reviews that paper, the research is valid.
In case a journal requires a fee, then given that neither a journal accepts a paper nor a conference accepts a paper, it follows that a publication is not delayed.
Supposing a conference requires a fee, then if it is not the case that a journal accepts a paper or a conference accepts a paper, a publication is not delayed.
If the team measures a pollution level, the research is valid.
Whenever the team estimates a pollution level, the research is valid.
If the team analyzes a chemical, then the team identifies a contaminant.
The team analyzes a chemical or the team collects a sample.
In case a sensor monitors a river, then the sensor detects a pollutant.
Whenever a sensor detects a pollutant, the sensor transmits data.
If a sensor triggers an alert, the research is valid.
In case a technician calibrates a sensor, then if the sensor detects a pollutant, the sensor triggers an alert.
A technician calibrates a sensor or a technician tests a sensor.
If a technician tests a sensor, then a supervisor verifies the sensor.
Supposing a director approves a procedure, then if a supervisor verifies a sensor, then given that the sensor detects a pollutant, the sensor triggers an alert.
If the team collects a sample, then the team publishes a study.
In case a lab verifies a contaminant, then whenever the team identifies a contaminant, the team publishes a study.
If a project lacks funding, then given that it is not the case that if the team analyzes a chemical then the team publishes a study, the results are inconclusive.
A project lacks funding or a project lacks equipment.
Under the condition that a project lacks equipment, then if it is not the case that provided the team analyzes a chemical the team publishes a study, the results are inconclusive.
A protocol is violated or the team uses an instrument.
Provided that an agency audits the team, then a protocol is not violated.
An agency audits the team or a committee investigates the team.
Supposing a board exonerates the team, then if a committee investigates the team, a protocol is not violated.
In case an institution issues an apology, then an institution demands a retraction.
If the team writes a report, then the team publishes a study.

rules.prover9_expression: (acknowledges(error, team) -> (-(disputes(community, findings) | (-(measures(team, pollution_level) | estimates(team, pollution_level)) -> -inaccurate(data))) -> issues_apology(institution)))
rules.natural: Provided that the team acknowledges an error, then given that it is not the case that the community disputes the findings or that if the team does not measure a pollution level or estimate a pollution level then the data are not inaccurate, an institution issues an apology.
Under the condition that the team corrects an error, then the team acknowledges an error.
If a database entry is updated, then the team corrects an error.
A database entry is updated or a paper entry is retracted.
Whenever a paper entry is retracted, the team corrects an error.
Provided that a study cites a source, then if it is not the case that if the team does not measure a pollution level or estimate a pollution level then data are missing, the study is not unreliable.
A study cites a source or a study references a source.

Supposing a study references a source, then given that it is not the case that if the team does not measure a pollution level or estimate a pollution level then data are missing, the study is not unreliable.
In case the team uses an instrument, then whenever the team analyzes a chemical, the team writes a report.
Provided that a funder awards a grant, then a funder compensates the team.
Under the condition that the team submits a paper, then a review confirms a finding.
The team submits a paper or a panel peer-reviews a paper.
Whenever it is not the case that a journal accepts a paper or a conference accepts a paper, a publication is delayed.
If it is not the case that a journal requires a fee or a conference requires a fee, then a publisher has open access.
Under the condition that it is not the case that the team measures a pollution level or estimates a pollution level, then data are inaccurate.

Under the condition that it is not the case that the community disputes the findings or that whenever the team does not measure a pollution level or estimate a pollution level the data are not inaccurate, then an institution does not demand a retraction.
In case it is not the case that provided the team analyzes a chemical the team publishes a study, then results are not inconclusive.
If it is not the case that if a sensor transmits data then the research is valid, then a data packet is lost.
Under the condition that it is not the case that if the team does not measure a pollution level or estimate a pollution level then data are missing, then a study is unreliable.

rules.prover9_expression: (-(-(disputes(community, findings) | (-(measures(team, pollution_level) | estimates(team, pollution_level)) -> -inaccurate(data))) -> demands_retraction(institution)) -> issues_correction(team))
rules.natural: In case it is not the case that if the community does not dispute the findings or that if the team does not measure a pollution level or estimate a pollution level then the data are not inaccurate, then an institution demands a retraction, then the team issues a correction.
If it is not the case that whenever a sensor does not transmit data the research is valid, then a data packet is not lost, then a funder awards a grant.
Under the condition that a director does not approve a procedure, then a project is halted.
Supposing the team does not use an instrument, then the team borrows an instrument.
